FlowSettings.name: FlowSettings
FlowSettings.label: Flow Settings
FlowSettings.description: Represents FlowSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableFlowPauseEnabled.description: enable Flow Pause Enabled field of FlowSettings metadata component.

enableFlowUseApexExceptionEmail.description: enable Flow Use Apex Exception Email field of FlowSettings metadata component.

enableLightningRuntimeEnabled.description: enable Lightning Runtime Enabled field of FlowSettings metadata component.

enableUseFlowBuilder.description: enable Use Flow Builder field of FlowSettings metadata component.

isAccessToInvokedApexRequired.description: is Access To Invoked Apex Required field of FlowSettings metadata component.
